item.title: Light Sites
item.description: Portfolio item: Light Sites, a Go-powered, no-JavaScript, template-friendly, lightweight markdown parser and server. It aims to combine Bootstrap CSS (and other customizable CSS if you choose) with Markdown with minimal configuration.
